metadata.name: IMAGHOSTXO EDITIONS 02 : MOTOPUTT
metadata.description:
THE IMAGHOSTXO EDITIONS SERIES :

MOTOPUTT BENT CIGARETTE is the Second Edition of what I hope will be a 5 Edition Series that ultimately leads to a final, “Special Piece.”   Each Edition in the Series will increase in quantity and decrease in price.   Collectors w/ a 52BODIES at the time of each EDITION launch receives that EDITION.  

The IMAGHOSTXO EDITIONS PRICING AND RELEASE PLAN:  
  E01 : LADDERS - 15 @ .03 - RELEASED 12:22:22  
  E02 : MOTOPUTT BENT CIGARETTE -  20 @ .025  
  E03 : XXX - 30 @ .02  
  E04 : XXX - 40 @ .015  
  E05  : XXX - 52 @ .01  


Those who collect all 5 Editions earn access to an EXCLUSIVE IMAGHOSTXO COLLAGE @ .005

THE IMAGE :   The determination and spirit of this moment brings me so much joy.   Putting by with a puff of smoke. Bulletproof and unphased. The slightly bent cigarette. I love the confidence and quirkiness in this image.   The details of the moped make me laugh.   Such a quick reaction shot, I smile each time I see it.
